alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 2:31AM MDT until November 06 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills including Arlington and Elk Mountain. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Widespread strong crosswinds could create significantly hazardous travel for all motorists on Interstate 80 between mile markers 240 and 290...especially for light weight and high profile vehicles...including light load semis and those towing camper trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
